pageTitle: Mountain Hardwear Men's Kevalo Full Zip Hoody | Outdoorplay.com
textBeforeTable: Mountain Hardwear Men's Kevalo Full Zip Hoody - The Men's Kevalo Full Zip Hoody by Mountain Hardwear is a classic full zip hoody in cozy cotton. With a low profile hood for close-fitting head and neck coverage and two front handwarmer pockets you will have a hard time finding a top that is more comfortable. Flat-lock seam construction eliminates chafing, thumb loops help to keep your hands warm and the detail with water based placement print will soon make this one of your favorites. Whether you are hiking the back country or just hanging with friends at the lodge, you will want to make sure you have the Men's Kevalo Full Zip Hoody by Mountain Hardwear.
